Author: jl777c#5810
Content: debugging how it recovers from load

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: @jorian I split the dealer function into two parts. one is the -dealer=1 node, and it processes the realtime bets

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: without -dealer=1, the node would be running the diceloop and it processes the backlog and ones missed by the dealer=1 node, it also generates the entropy tx

Author: jorian#4555
Content: so the entropy creation doesn't interfere with handling the bets?

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: if it is on the dealer node it causes the lockups

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: but it needs to be signing the dealer privkey

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: so we need one node doing the diceloop and the other node the realtime processing

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: I cant get my single node to catch up on the entropy tx while processing the dicebets coming in, as it locks up
